Text:
Minimum system requirements: Minimum system requirements: Windows XP / Windows Vista / Windows 7, 1.8 GHz Processor, 1GB RAM, 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9.0c, 250 MB HD space, Mouse, Keyboard.

Installation

Install and play

I keep getting this error:


___________________________________________
ERROR in
action number 1
of Create Event
for object objDevolver:

Error defining an external function.


I don't get any music. I get all other sound but just no music. Any help?
If the music won't play, try unzipping close to your root directory (c:hotline) and rebooting your computer.
